title: Billionaires and the tax code, Facebook smartwatch and a listener mail question on children's screen time
description:
Kara and Scott talk about the ProPublica report that America's wealthiest people paid basically nothing in taxes and what the country should do about it. They also discuss Facebook's upcoming smartwatch and the wearables industry.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
